sql.INSERT_MOVIE: INSERT INTO Movie (ratings, run_time, poster_path, plot, title,release_date) VALUES (%s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s)
sql.INSERT_REVIEW: INSERT INTO review (author_id, movie_id, points, review) VALUES (%s, %s, %s, %s)
sql.FETCH_ALL_REVIEW: SELECT u.username, r.review FROM Review r INNER JOIN User u ON r.author_id = u.user_id AND r.movie_id = %s
